subject: Re: [junit] junit 4 @Before v constructor
msgSnippet: ... Thanks, I ll give it a go, although we re in the final month before shipping, and not keen to upgrade our whole build. Does the ant task release test for
messageBody:
On 8 Jul 2006, at 20:58, Jan Cumps wrote:
> The one that comes with ant 1.7 (currently from svn)
> is pretty cool. I'm
> test driving it for a few months with junit4. It works
> like a charm.
>
Thanks, I'll give it a go, although we're in the final month before
shipping, and not keen to upgrade our whole build.

Does the ant task release test for garbage collection once they've
been run?

Duncan
